name: Pattern Pictures!
description:
The PATTERN PICTURES is a new creative game developing with new figures and colors from the Bead Pictures. This is a pleasure game for every children and adult to have a sense of fine arts.

- 8 pattern sets
- 48 patterns
- 4 tables
- unlimited combination
- you can save and load your creations
- you can save to Photo Album
- post your picture on your facebook wall
